resources.string: The description of the body cars
Find out what body cars suit you
Do you want to know other details besides the body car?
How do I change my account data?
How do I change my password?
How do I create an account?
I forgot my password, what should I do?

string-array.name: accountHelpDescription
string-array.item: 1. In any interface you are in, click on the icon on the top left.
2. Click on the icon with the text: account details.
3. Click on the pencil icon for data changes.

string-array.name: passwordHelpDescription
string-array.item: 1. In any interface you are in, click on the icon on the top left.
2. Click on the icon with the text: account details.
3. Click on the text: \"Change password\".
4. Fill in the blanks and click on \"Change password\".

string-array.name: createAccountHelp
string-array.item: 1. In the login page click on the text: \"No account yet? Create one.\"
2. In the registration page, fill in the fields and click on the \"Register\" button.

string-array.name: fpassHelp
string-array.item: 1. Go to the login page.
2. Click on \"Forgot password?\".

string-array.name: descHelp
string-array.item: 1. You have 2 description options, you can identify them by this icon:
2. If you click on one of the description options, you will be redirected to a page that contains a list of the brands or the body cars.

string-array.name: filterHelp
string-array.item: 1. You have 2 filtering options, which can be identified by this icon:
2. If you click on one of them, you will be redirected to a page that contains a quiz to filter the cars or the body cars.

string-array.name: compareHelp
string-array.item: 1. The comparison option can be identified by this icon:
2. When you click on it, you will be redirected to a page that will tell you to choose the 2 body cars you want to compare.

resources.string: These are the body cars from which it would be advisable to choose:

string-array.name: descrieri
string-array.item: • The compact car, identified as a small car in Europe, falls between medium and subcompact vehicles. Usually, Honda Civic, Hyundai Elantra, Chrysler PT Cruiser and Audi A3 fall into the compact category. The compact can be a hatchback model, with two and four doors and a compact sport. Generally, they are equipped from the factory with a four-cylinder engine. \n • The compact has been available in some form since the car\'s inception, but as cars grew, the compact officially debuted with the 1950\'s Nash Rambler, which sat on a 254-centimeter wheelbase. \n • Small or compact vehicles have between 100-109 cubic meters of combined passenger and freight volume and have a length between 409 and 475 centimeters.

• The sedan is a type of car with a closed body, with 2 or 4 doors, with 2 side windows on each side, arranged for four or more passengers. \n • Its main purpose is to transport people on normal roads. \n • The sedan is one of the most common types of body cars nowadays.

• It has 2 or 4 doors. \n • This type of body is also called a two-volume body, one of the volumes being the engine compartment and the second passenger compartment fused with the trunk. \n • As a rule, the rear hatch has hinges at the upper end, and the backrests of the rear seat row can be folded down to increase cargo space.

• It has 2 doors, but newer coupe models also have 4. \n • They are generally provided for two people, the back seats being more uncomfortable for adults, but for certain situations they are perfect for children. \n • The term coupe comes from the French translation of \"cut\".

• It has 4 doors, it is a type of body suitable for holidays. 
 • Recommended for families with 2 children. 
 • They are derived from the sedan body type. 
 • Provides a large luggage storage space by folding the rear seats.
• It has 2 doors, it is a spider body. \n • The number of seats is 2, one for the driver and one for the other passenger. \n • No roof.

• Also called drop-head coupe. 
 • It can be turned into an open car thanks to the retractable roof. 
 • The number of doors is 2, with 4 seats available for passengers by folding the front seats. 
 • Can be used in both urban and non-urban environments.

• In the United States they were called Supercars. 
 • It can be turned into an open car thanks to the retractable roof. 
 • The number of doors is 2, with seats available for both the driver and 2 more passengers, 3 if convenience is not taken into account. 
 • Can be used in both urban and non-urban environments.

• Sport body car born in Europe. 
 • Due to its design it offers dynamic performance. 
 • The number of doors is 2, normally these cars are for 2 people, but newer models have 2 more seats with less comfort. 
 • Can be used in both urban and non-urban environments.

• SUV comes from sport utility vehicle. 
 • Specific for families with 2 children. 
 • The number of doors is 4, with 5 seats available. 
 • They are specific to the extra-urban environment.

• SUV comes from the sport utility vehicle. 
 • Compact SUV is a smaller SUV body type. 
 • Specific for families with 2 children. 
 • The number of doors is 2 or 4, with 5 seats available. 
 • Smaller luggage storage space than a normal SUV. 
 • They are specific to the extra-urban environment.

• Usually a derivation of a sedan or SUV. 
 • Large storage space for materials or luggage in the back, without a roof. 
 • The number of doors is 2 or 4, with 5 seats available. 
 • Specific to the extra-urban environment and construction companies that require storage of certain materials.

• The number of rows for passengers is 3. 
 • Large storage space for materials or luggage. 
 • The number of available seats is 7-8. 
 • Specific to the extra-urban environment, but also urban for larger families.

• It is usually used to transport people or goods. 
 • In most cases it has no windows in the back. 
 • Large storage space for materials or luggage. 
 • The number of seats available is 2-3 for vans used for the purpose of transporting goods or more than 8 for the purpose of transporting persons. 
 • Specific to the extra-urban environment.

string-array.name: pro
string-array.item:
• High autonomy compared to larger vehicles; 
 • It often costs less than larger vehicles. 
 • Easier to park and handle. 
 • Provides a fun and different driving experience. 
 • Popularity for resale. 
 • Sometimes they are more reliable because they are more basic and are used especially worldwide.

• Sedans are more stable at high speeds. 
 • Provides more privacy (small windows, not visible inside). 
 • Large trunk (compared to the hatchback). 
 • It has 4 doors, so each passenger can enter directly into his seat.

• Suitable for the city. 
 • Can be easily maneuvered in parking lots, returns. 
 • Easy to drive for beginners. 
 • Provides better autonomy.
• It is suitable for the city. \n • It is easy to drive for any type of driver, in terms of experience. \n • Part of the roof is retractable.

• Suitable for holidays. 
 • It is easy to drive for both experienced and advanced drivers. 
 • Large luggage storage space. 
 • Fuel economy due to low weight.
• Freedom. \n • Better visibility than normal cars due to the lack of the top and sides of the road.
• Freedom, but also the possibility to close the roof in case of rain. \n • Better visibility than normal cars due to the possibility of retracting the roof. \n • Can be used in any environment.
• The freedom offered by the retractable roof. \n • Can be used in any environment.
• Dynamic performance. \n • Can be used in any environment.
• Suitable for holidays, but also for companies. \n • Large luggage storage space. \n • 4x4 traction, more precisely for the Off-road environment.
• High seating position. \n • High safety in the event of an accident due to the size of the body. \n • 4x4 traction, more precisely for the Off-road environment.

• Off-road skills are better. 
 • Large storage space for luggage or materials. 
 • More power for towing and transport. 
 • 4x4 traction, more precisely for the Off-road environment.

• Suitable for family holidays. 
 • Large luggage storage space. 
 • Many seats available. 
 • High safety in the event of an accident due to the size of the body.

• Suitable for passenger transport companies or construction companies. 
 • Large storage space for luggage or materials. 
 • The number of seats can be as large as desired. 
 • High safety in the event of an accident due to the size of the body.

string-array.name: contra
string-array.item:
• Less power so you can get more time to reach higher speeds and it will be slower, climbing big hills and rough terrain. 
 • It may not offer a trip as smooth as larger cars on long journeys. 
 • May be more dangerous if involved in car accidents. 
 • Less space for drivers, passengers and freight. 
 • You may be aware of how you look in a small vehicle, especially when larger cars pass by you. 
 • Not suitable as a family or holiday car
• Not recommended for travel. \n • Small windows. \n • It has a large trunk compared to the hatchback, but compared to an SUV it is quite small.
• Small trunk. \n • Not suitable for more than 2 people. \n • The trunk and passenger seat are together, providing an easy possibility to steal just by breaking a window.
• Not suitable for families. \n • By the time the sun disappears, the unfolding roof is no longer so practical.
• Not suitable for novice drivers. \n • The rectangular shape is less dynamic.

• Not suitable for rainy days. 
 • There are seats only for the driver and another passenger. 
 • Low security when it comes to storing luggage in this car. 
 • The inside of the machine will get dirty much faster.
• Not suitable for families. \n • Small luggage storage space.
• Not suitable for families. \n • Small luggage storage space.
• Not suitable for families. \n • Small luggage storage space.
• Not suitable for beginners. \n • Hard to handle in tight spaces or cities.
• Not suitable for beginners. \n • Smaller luggage storage space than a normal SUV.
• Not suitable for beginners. \n • Hard to handle in tight spaces or cities. \n • Few models to choose from.
• Not suitable for beginners. \n • Hard to handle in tight spaces or cities. \n • They are not as effective in snow or off-road areas.
• Not suitable for beginners. \n • Hard to handle in tight spaces or cities. \n • Low pulling power.

string-array.name: istoricMarci
glume
string-array.item:
Talk at a taxi station: 
– What are your prices? 
– 3 dollars for starting and 1.5 dollars for the kilometer. 
– Go ahead, I'll take it on the go.…

The policeman asks the hospitalized driver: 
- How did the accident happen? 
- The driver of the car in front of me signaled a change of direction to the left. 
- And? 
- And, contrary to all my predictions, he turned left…

A driver, wanting to protect his car from thieves and not having money for an alarm, leaves a note on the windshield of the car: \n- \'Radio - defective, petrol - missing, engine - missing components \'. \n- In the morning he finds his car on the logs and another note that read: \'SO, it doesn\'t need wheels anymore! \'

The traffic officer stops a car driven by an old lady: 
– Ma'am! It is not good to drive at 20 km/h, because you are obstructing traffic! 
– But I only respected the speed limit of 21 km/h. 
– Ma'am! That indicator does not show the speed limit, but the fact that you are driving on the National Road no. 21. 
– Really? Thank you very much… The agent notices that the passengers are sitting in a grave silence in the car. 
– Ma'am! Why are your passengers so frozen? 
– Oh, they are fine… They still haven't recovered since I turned off National Road no. 195.
What is written on page 39 of the Logan manual? \n- R: The bus schedule.
Talk at Dacia: \n– What should be changed for our cars to comply with international norms? \n– The international norms.
A driver is stopped by a police officer. The driver got out of the car, stunned, and asked the policeman: \n- Was I going too fast? \n- No, you were flying too low!
Two friends were talking: \n- How was the car exam? \n- I don\'t know, when I left the hospital, the examiner was still unconscious.

A guy in a taxi pats the driver on the shoulder to ask him something. The driver shouts, loses control of the car, barely manages to avoid a bus coming from the opposite direction, enters the sidewalk, and finally stops a few inches in front of a shop window! For a few seconds it\'s total silence, then the driver shouts: \n- \"Never do that again!\" You scared me to death! The passenger remains masked and apologizes as best as he can: \n- \"I couldn\'t know you\'ll be so scared of a touch on your shoulder?\" \"It\'s my fault, too,\" the driver said more calmly. Today was my first day as a taxi driver. For the last 25 years I have been the driver of a funeral home!

The cop wants to put the ampoule to a driver. 
- I can't blow, I have asthma. 
- Then let's take your blood. 
- I can't, I'm hemophilic. 
- Then go on the white band. 
- I can't, I'm drunk.

A car mechanic reaches the sky and complains to Saint Peter: \n- How can I die at 38? \n- Look, we\'ve collected all the workmanship hours from the receipts you issued and it turns out you\'re 90 years old.
